dmca.title: Dream Works Complains about Unauthorized Use of American Idol Finalist's Song
dmca.body:
OCT 05 2006 23:05

KEATS McFARLAND & WILSON LLP 
ATTORNEYS AT LAW 
9720 WILSHIRE BOULEVARD 
PENTHOUSE SUITE 
BEVERLY HILLS. CALIFORNIA 90212
TELEPHONE (310) 248-3830  
FAX (310) 860-0363

October 6, 2006 

VIA E-MAIL AM) FAX 

Blogger Legal Support DMCA 
Google Inc 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View, CA 
94043 

Fax (650)618-2680 

Re: Unauthorized Use of DreamWorks and Paramount Properties http://ybf.blogspot.com/2O06/10/jennifer-hudson-kills-itcandids-galore.html

To Whom It May Concern: 

This letter is being written to you on behalf of Dream Works SKG 
("DreamWorks") and Paramount Pictures Corporation ("Paramount"). DreamWorks and Paramount are the owners of copyright and other intellectual property rights in and to the "And I Am Telling You" music recording by Jennifer Hudson. No one is authorized to copy, reproduce, distribute, or otherwise use the "And I am telling You" music recording without express written permission of Paramount and DreamWorks. 

We have recently learned that the web site located at 
"http://ybf.blogspot.com/2O06/10/jennifer-hudson-kills-itcandids-galore.html," for which you are the service provider is reproducing and/or distributing unauthorized copies of "And I Am Telling You." 

On behalf of DreamWorks and Paramount, we request your assistance in the removal of this link to the unauthorized content. 

In accordance with the DMCA, we request your assistance in the removal of the "And I Am Telling You" music recording by Jennifer Hudson from this web site and any other sites for which you act as an Internet Service Provider. We have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. Furthermore we, hereby, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that we are authorized to act on behalf of Dream Works and Paramount.

Very truly yours
[signed]
David K. Caplan
Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP
